content.rendered: It comes from Beef.Since south asia people are like pungent so these recipes are more popular in south Asia.To prepare this you need mutton, Garam masala, curd, tomato, turmeric, garlic, chili, onin and oil etc.Mix all the items with meat and cook it after 10-15 minutes then tomato, ginger, garlic grind together in the food processor and mix water give them in cooking pan.And cook until it is juicy and tender.

excerpt.rendered: Garlic-margarine steak chomps are all that you love about a steakhouse steak, with none of the work. Rather than cooking an entire steak, bits of New York strip steak get cooked in a stunning garlic spread that is inherent to a similar skillet the steak is cooked in.
